task: Create the note titled 'To-Do List' if it doesn't exist.
solution:
# Task 0: Create the note titled 'To-Do List' if it doesn't exist.

def task_0():
    tap($open_note)
    open_note_titles = $open_note_title_list
    note_exists = False
    for i in range(len(open_note_titles)):
        if get_text($open_note_titles[i]) == 'To-Do List':
            note_exists = True
            break
    if not note_exists:
        back()
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'To-Do List')
        tap($text_note_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
task_0()

task: Create a checklist item titled 'Buy groceries' if it doesn't exist.
solution:
# Task 1: Create a checklist item titled 'Buy groceries' if it doesn't exist.

def task_1():
    tap($open_note)
    open_note_titles = $open_note_title_list
    for i in range(len(open_note_titles)):
        if get_text($open_note_titles[i]) == 'To-Do List':
            tap($open_note_titles[i])
            break
    checklist_items = $checklist_item_list
    item_exists = False
    for i in range(len(checklist_items)):
        if get_text($checklist_items[i]) == 'Buy groceries':
            item_exists = True
            break
    if not item_exists:
        tap($add_checklist_item)
        set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Buy groceries')
        tap($add_checklist_item_ok)
    back()
    back()
task_1()

task: Open a checklist note or create one if there is none.
solution:
try:
    tap($open_note)
    notes = $open_note_title_list
    checklist_note_found = False
    for note in notes:
        note_title = get_text(note)
        if 'checklist' in note_title.lower():
            tap(note)
            checklist_note_found = True
            break
    if not checklist_note_found:
        throw ValueError('No checklist note found')
except:
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)

task: Open a checklist note or create one if there is none
solution:
try:
    tap($open_note)
    open_note_title_list = $open_note_title_list
    for i in range(len(open_note_title_list)):
        tap(open_note_title_list[i])
        note_content = get_text($note_content)
        if not isinstance(note_content, str):
            # It's a checklist note
            break
    else:
        # No checklist found, create one
        back()
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
except:
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)

task: Open a checklist note or create one if there is none.
solution:
notes = $open_note_title_list
is_checklist = lambda note: 'checklist' in get_text(note).lower()

task: Ensure a checklist note is open or create one if none exists.
solution:
def ensure_checklist_note_open():
    tap($open_note)
    notes = $open_note_title_list
    for note in notes:
        note_title = get_text(note)
        if note_title.endswith('(Checklist)'):
            tap(note)
            return
    back()
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)

def create_note_if_not_exists(note_title):
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, note_title)
    tap($text_note_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)

    tap($open_note)
    notes = $open_note_title_list
    for i in range(len(notes)):
        if get_text(notes[i]) == note_title:
            back()
            return
    back()
    create_note_if_not_exists(note_title)

task: Open a checklist note or create one if there is none.
Open a checklist note with at least two items or create one if there is none.
solution:
if len($open_note_title_list) == 0:
    tap($open_note)
    if len($open_note_title_list) == 0:
        tap($create_note)
        tap($checklist_type)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($add_note_ok)
else:
    checklist_found = False
    for i in range(len($open_note_title_list)):
        tap($open_note)
        tap($open_note_title_list[i])
        if len($checklist_item_list) > 1:
            checklist_found = True
            break
    if not checklist_found:
        tap($create_note)
        tap($checklist_type)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($add_note_ok)
        tap($add_checklist_item)
        set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Item 1')
        tap($add_checklist_item_ok)
        tap($add_checklist_item)
        set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Item 2')
        tap($add_checklist_item_ok)

task: Open a checklist note with at least three items or create one if there is none.

        tap($add_checklist_item)

        tap($add_checklist_item_ok)

task: Create a checklist item titled 'Buy Groceries' if it doesn't exist.
solution:

open_checklists = [get_text(note) for note in $open_note_title_list]
back()
for checklist_title in open_checklists:
    tap($open_note)
    tap($open_note_title_list.match({'title': checklist_title})[0])
    if 'Buy Groceries' not in [get_text(item) for item in $checklist_item_list]:
        tap($add_checklist_item)
        set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Buy Groceries')
        tap($add_checklist_item_ok)
        back()
        break
    back()

task: Open multiple notes to facilitate navigation between them.
solution:
tap($open_note)
note_count = len($open_note_title_list)
note_indices = list(range(note_count))
for idx in note_indices:
    tap($open_note_title_list[idx])
    # Navigate by switching to next and back
    if idx != note_count - 1:
        tap($switch_to_next_item)
        tap($switch_to_prev_item)
back()

task: Ensure a checklist is currently open.
solution:

    tap($open_note)
    checklist_found = False
    for idx in range(len($open_note_title_list)):
        tap($open_note_title_list[idx])
        if 'checklist' in get_text($item_title):

            break
        tap($open_note)  # Go back to the list of notes
    if not checklist_found:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)

def open_or_create_text_note():
    tap($open_note)
    note_titles = $open_note_title_list
    if len(note_titles) > 0:
        for idx in range(len(note_titles)):
            tap(note_titles[idx])
            if get_attributes($text_note_type)["selected"]:
                return
        back()
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Text Note')
    tap($text_note_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
open_or_create_text_note()

task: Open a checklist note or create one if none exists.
solution:
"""
# Open a checklist note or create one if none exists.
try:
    # Open note and find a checklist
    tap($open_note)
    checklist_found = False
    for i in range(len($open_note_title_list)):
        tap($open_note_title_list[i])
        if get_attributes($checklist_item_list)['scrollable']:
            checklist_found = True
            break
    if not checklist_found:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
catch:
    # If no checklists exist, create one
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
"""

task: Open a checklist note or create one if none exists and mark some items as done.
solution:
"""
# Open a checklist note or create one if none exists and mark some items as done.
try:
    # Open note and find a checklist
    tap($open_note)
    checklist_found = False
    for i in range(len($open_note_title_list)):
        tap($open_note_title_list[i])
        if get_attributes($checklist_item_list)['scrollable']:
            checklist_found = True
            break
    if not checklist_found:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
    for j in range(len($checklist_item_list)):
        if j % 2 == 0:  # Check some items as done
            tap($checklist_item_list[j])
catch:
    # If no checklists exist, create one
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
    # Add items to the checklist and mark some as done
    for k in range(5):
        tap($add_checklist_item)
        set_text($add_checklist_item_title, f'Item {k}')
        tap($add_checklist_item_ok)
        if k % 2 == 0:
            tap($checklist_item_list[k])
"""

def ensure_multiple_notes():
    tap($open_note)

task: Ensure there is an existing checklist open.
solution:
# Ensure there is an existing checklist open.
def ensure_existing_checklist():
    tap($open_note)
    notes = $open_note_title_list
    if len(notes) > 0:
        tap(notes[0])
        try:
            checklist_items = $checklist_item_list
            back()
            if len(checklist_items) > 0:
                return
        except:
            back()
    while len(notes) == 0 or len(checklist_items) == 0:
        back()
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'Checklist Title')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
        tap($open_note)
        notes = $open_note_title_list
        tap(notes.match('Checklist Title')[0])
        checklist_items = $checklist_item_list
    back()

ensure_existing_checklist()

task: Ensure there is an existing note open.
solution:
# Ensure there is an existing note open.
def ensure_existing_note():
    tap($open_note)
    notes = $open_note_title_list
    if len(notes) > 0:
        tap(notes[0])
        try:
            note_content = $note_content
            back()
            if note_content:
                return
        except:
            back()
    while len(notes) == 0 or not note_content:
        back()
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'Note Title')
        tap($text_note_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
        tap($open_note)
        notes = $open_note_title_list
        tap(notes.match('Note Title')[0])
        note_content = $note_content
    back()

ensure_existing_note()

task: Open a checklist note or create one if there is none
Create the checklist 'Daily Workout Plan' if it doesn't exist.
solution:
def create_checklist_if_not_exists(title):
    tap($open_note)
    existing_titles = get_text($open_note_title_list)
    if title not in existing_titles:
        tap($create_note)
        tap($checklist_type)
        set_text($add_note_title, title)
        tap($add_note_ok)
    else:
        back()

create_checklist_if_not_exists('Daily Workout Plan')

task: Open an existing note or create a new note.
Open an existing note or create a new note.
Open an existing note or create a new note.
Open a checklist note or create one if there is none.
solution:
try:
    tap($open_note)
    notes = $open_note_title_list
    checklists = [note for note in notes if get_text(note).startswith('Checklist')]
    if len(checklists) > 0:
        tap(checklists[0])
    else:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($text_note_type) if get_attributes($text_note_type)['selected'] else None
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
except:
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($text_note_type) if get_attributes($text_note_type)['selected'] else None
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)

task: Open a checklist note or create one if there is none
solution:
if len($open_note_title_list) == 0:
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
else:
    note_titles = get_text($open_note_title_list)
    checklist_exists = any('Checklist' in title for title in note_titles)
    if not checklist_exists:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
    else:
        checklist_index = next(i for i, title in enumerate(note_titles) if 'Checklist' in title)
        tap($open_note_title_list[checklist_index])

task: Open a note or create one if there is none
solution:

    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Note')

    tap($add_note_ok)
else:
    note_titles = get_text($open_note_title_list)
    note_exists = any('Note' in title for title in note_titles)
    if not note_exists:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Note')
        tap($text_note_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
    else:
        note_index = next(i for i, title in enumerate(note_titles) if 'Note' in title)
        tap($open_note_title_list[note_index])

task: Open a checklist note or create one if there is none
solution:
if len($open_note_title_list) == 0:
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
else:
    note_titles = get_text($open_note_title_list)
    checklist_exists = any('Checklist' in title for title in note_titles)
    if not checklist_exists:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)
    else:
        checklist_index = next(i for i, title in enumerate(note_titles) if 'Checklist' in title)
        tap($open_note_title_list[checklist_index])

task: If a checklist note titled 'Weekend Tasks' already exists, rename or delete it.
solution:
tap($open_note)
weekend_tasks = $open_note_title_list.match('Weekend Tasks')
if len(weekend_tasks) > 0:
    tap(weekend_tasks[0])
    tap($more_options_checklist)
    if len($more_option_checklist_buttons.match('Rename note')) > 0:
        tap($more_option_checklist_buttons.match('Rename note')[0])
        set_text($rename_input, 'New Title')
        tap($rename_ok)
    else:
        tap($more_option_checklist_buttons.match('Delete note')[0])
        tap($delete_note_ok)

    back()

task: Open a checklist note or create one and make it the current checklist.
solution:
try:
    tap($open_note)
    notes_list = $open_note_title_list
    checklist_opened = False
    for note in notes_list:
        if get_attributes(note)['checked']:  # Assuming 'checked' means it is a checklist note
            tap(note)
            checklist_opened = True
            break
    if not checklist_opened:
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($checklist_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)

    tap($create_note)

    tap($add_note_ok)

task: If a checklist note with items 'Passport', 'Tickets', 'Charger' already exists, rename or modify it.
solution:
tap($open_note)
notes = $open_note_title_list
for i in range(len(notes)):
    tap(notes[i])
    tap($more_options_note)
    tap($open_note_title)
    items = $checklist_item_list
    match_items = [False, False, False]
    for j in range(len(items)):
        item_text = get_text(items[j])
        if item_text == 'Passport':
            match_items[0] = True
        elif item_text == 'Tickets':
            match_items[1] = True
        elif item_text == 'Charger':
            match_items[2] = True
        if all(match_items):
            tap($more_options_checklist)
            tap($rename_note)
            set_text($rename_input, 'Modified Checklist')
            tap($rename_ok)
            break
    else:
        tap($add_checklist_item)
        set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Additional Item')
        tap($add_checklist_item_ok)

solution:

    checklist_found = False 
    for note in open_notes: 
        tap(note)

task: Ensure no conflicting note titles exist.
solution:
def ensure_no_conflicting_titles():
    tap($open_note)
    open_notes = $open_note_title_list
    titles = set()
    for i in range(len(open_notes)):
        title_element = open_notes[i]
        title = get_text(title_element)
        if title in titles:
            print('Duplicate title found:', title)
            return False
        titles.add(title)
    return True

ensure_no_conflicting_titles()

task: Ensure no conflicting checklist note titles exist.
solution:
def ensure_no_conflicting_checklist_titles():
    tap($create_note)
    tap($checklist_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
    tap($more_options_checklist)
    tap($sort_checklist_items)
    checklist_titles = $checklist_item_list
    titles = set()
    for i in range(len(checklist_titles)):
        title_element = checklist_titles[i]
        title = get_text(title_element)
        if title in titles:
            print('Duplicate checklist title found:', title)
            return False
        titles.add(title)
    return True

ensure_no_conflicting_checklist_titles()

task: Ensure a note is open.
Ensure a note is open.
Ensure a checklist note is open.
Open the Notes app settings.
Open a checklist note or create one if there is none
solution:
try:
    tap($open_note)
    notes = $open_note_title_list
    found_checklist = False
    for note in notes:
        tap(note)
        if not get_attributes($note_content)['editable']:  # verify if it's a checklist not a text note
            found_checklist = True
            break
        else:
            back()
    if not found_checklist:
        back()  # Ensuring we are out of notes
        tap($create_note)
        tap($add_note_types.match({'label': 'Checklist'}))
        set_text($add_note_title, 'New Checklist')
        tap($add_note_ok)
except:
    pass
